column1: Rheumatoid lung disease is a group of lung problems related to rheumatoid arthritis.

The condition can include: - Blockage of the small airways (bronchiolitis obliterans) - Fluid in the chest (pleural effusions) - High blood pressure in the lungs (pulmonary hypertension) - Lumps in the lungs (nodules) - Scarring (pulmonary fibrosis)
